extension.searchTitle: DISAPPROVING A RULE SUBMITTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 44

congVote.result: The joint resolution (H.J. Res. 42) was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: <P/>By 51 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. 87), Senate passed H.J. Res. 42, disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to drug testing of unemployment compensation applicants.
